string-array.name: category_0_titles
string-array.item: Apple 2022 MacBook Air Laptop with M2 chip: 13.6-inch Liquid Retina Display, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD Storage
Apple Magic Mouse: Wireless, Bluetooth, Rechargeable. Works with Mac or iPad
Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation) Wireless Earbuds
Apple Studio Display - Standard Glass - Tilt-Adjustable Stand

string-array.name: category_0_descriptions
string-array.item: DualSense Wireless Controller integration: Feel your journey through the Norse realms, made possible by immersive haptic feedback and adaptive trigger functionality.
The redesigned MacBook Air is more portable than ever and weighs just 2.7 pounds.
Magic Mouse is wireless and rechargeable, with an optimized foot design that lets it glide smoothly across your desk.
Personalized Spatial Audio surrounds you in sound tuned just for you. It works with dynamic head tracking to immerse you deeper in music and movies.
An immersive 27-inch 5K Retina display with a 12MP camera with Center Stage, studio-quality mics, and six-speaker sound system.

string-array.name: category_1_titles
string-array.item: The Ordinary - Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution
La Roche-Posay Anthelios Uvmune Ultra Light Creme SPF 50+
Dolce Gabbana The One for Men Eau de Parfum Spray

string-array.name: category_1_descriptions
string-array.item: Philips shaver series 9000 cuts up to 20% more hair in a single stroke.
Dior Homme Intense 2011 by Dior is a Woody Floral Musk fragrance for men. Dior Homme Intense 2011 was launched in 2011.
Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution is an exfoliant targeted at the surface of the skin. It helps improve skin clarity, balance uneven skin tone, and correct texture over time.
La Roche-Posay Anthelios UVmune Ultra Light Cream SPF50+ är en ansiktssolkräm för alla hudtyper. Formulan innehåller thermalskt vatten från La-Roche Posay.
The One for Men Eau de Parfum is part of the iconic world of The One, offering a deeper fragrance experience for the perfume connoisseur. Masculine and magnetic, this highly intense scent.

string-array.name: category_2_titles
string-array.item: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra SM-S918B 5G Dual SIM 8GB RAM
Google Pixel 7 Pro - 5G Android Phone - Unlocked Smartphone with Telephoto/Wide Angle Lens, and 24-Hour Battery - 128GB
Nothing Phone 1 Smartphone Unlocked 5G Android Phone Snapdragon 778G+

string-array.name: category_2_descriptions
string-array.item: Capture the colours of the world in their truest form with the revolutionary Find X3 Pro. Rich tones and deep hues combine to illuminate the road to the future.
Whether you’re headed to a concert or romantic night out, there’s no such thing as bad lighting with Night Mode; Galaxy S23 Ultra lets you capture epic content.
The new Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset is the most advanced chipset for Android devices, with increased CPU and GPU performance. Integrated AI processes improve background app usage.
Google Pixel 7 Pro is Google’s best-of-everything phone; powered by Google Tensor G2, it’s faster, more efficient, and more secure.
Behind the speed of Nothing Phone (1) is the Snapdragon 778G+ chipset. Cue phenomenal graphics. Enhanced gaming. Advanced camera functions. No charging head in the package.

string-array.name: category_3_titles
string-array.item: Columbia Mens Glennaker Lake Rain Jacket
MakeMeChic Womens Summer Boho Dress Floral Print
Nike Mens Giannis Immortality White/Metallic Gold-Black
THE NORTH FACE Half Dome Pullover Hoodie

string-array.name: category_3_descriptions
string-array.item: WATERPROOF TECHNOLOGY: You’ll love our Columbia Mens Glennaker Lake Rain Jacket, it features our Hydroplus waterproof nylon fabric for the ultimate in lightweight, wet weather, protection and comfort.

Feature: floral print, spaghetti strap, tie strap, square neck, cottagecore, sleeveless, knot shoulder, shirred, ruffle, a line, summer boho dress, maxi dress, vacation beach outfits for women, beach sun dress.
Specially engineered Synthetic and mesh upper - delivers maximum breathability without looking meshy! Rubber TPU outsole - provides supreme traction where you need it.
The Nike revolution 5 is made from recycled emp knit providing an athletic look Built for revolutionary comfort and responsiveness.
Not too big yet not too tight, this standard fit t-shirt skims the body while offering freedom of movement through the shoulders, chest, and torso. Wear it tucked.
